nodes.text: A blastromech droid was a standard astromech droid that had been modified to serve as a battle droid.
Blastromech droids had an addition of two or more blasters on top of their bodies.
Blastromech droids could be found in use by the Death Watch at their bunker on the forest moon of Endor.
Borvo the Hutt owned several blastromechs to defend his vault on Naboo, as well as the Ultragungans in their bunker.
